periods.name: Overnight
periods.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy. Low around 36, with temperatures rising to around 38 overnight. West northwest wind 10 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph.

periods.name: Wednesday
periods.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 44, with temperatures falling to around 41 in the afternoon. West northwest wind 10 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 32 mph.

periods.name: Wednesday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy. Low around 31, with temperatures rising to around 33 overnight. West northwest wind around 8 mph.

periods.name: Thanksgiving Day
periods.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 43. West northwest wind 5 to 9 mph.

periods.name: Thursday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 23. Northwest wind around 3 mph.

periods.name: Friday
periods.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 40. West northwest wind around 2 mph.

periods.name: Friday Night
periods.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Chance Snow Showers
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of snow showers after midnight. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 28. Southeast wind 2 to 7 mph. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

periods.name: Saturday
periods.shortForecast: Chance Rain And Snow Showers then Rain And Snow Showers
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of rain and snow showers before noon, then rain and snow showers. Cloudy, with a high near 41. South southeast wind 7 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

periods.name: Saturday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Rain showers. Cloudy, with a low around 32. South southwest wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

periods.name: Sunday
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 40. Northwest wind around 9 mph.

periods.name: Sunday Night
periods.shortForecast: Chance Rain Showers then Slight Chance Snow Showers
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before midnight, then a slight chance of snow showers. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 22. North wind around 7 mph. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

periods.name: Monday
periods.shortForecast: Chance Snow Showers then Chance Rain Showers
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of snow showers before noon, then a chance of rain showers. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 33. North wind around 6 mph. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

periods.name: Monday Night
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of snow showers. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 21. North wind around 6 mph. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

periods.name: Tuesday
periods.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers. Mostly sunny, with a high near 35. North northwest wind around 7 mph.
